Name: My Stepmom is a Futanari 3
About the game: Things aren't great at work, but at least you have your stepmom to console you. She's always been there for you and always manages to cheer you up. One particular Friday, after along day at work, she suggests that you accompany her to get something to wear to an upcoming event at her work. After browsing around her favorite boutique, she manages to find something she likes, and decides to try it on before seeking your approval. So, how does she look? Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions. Gameplay Kinetic Visual Novel H-Scenes ~5K words Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective. Get to know your stepmom on a very intimate level as you read through an encounters ranging from platonic, to flirtatious, to downright sexual and experimental, in a naughty kind of way...
